*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}html{scroll-behavior:smooth;color:#fff}body{font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;overflow-x:hidden;background:url(/2e8bfe58749e5596e9d9711dd5af76e3.svg)
